Header.headerText: Clean code. Sharp decisions. Steady hand.
Header.title: Arbuz Tanya

Hero.title: Tanya Arbuz
Hero.description: I build scalable and modular systems with a keen focus on architecture, clean code, and iterative delivery. I take full ownership of challenges to deliver results, continuously seeking ways to enhance product and engineering processes, and transforming complex problems into robust, effective solutions.
Hero.descriptionMobile: I build scalable and modular systems with a keen focus on architecture, clean code, and iterative delivery.

AboutMe.leftSubtitle: A warrior doesn't boast — he simply knows what he's capable of.
AboutMe.description1: <highlight>Full-stack Software Engineer</highlight> with <highlight>over 4 years of experience in web development</highlight>. I specialize in creating <secondary>scalable web applications with React/Nest.js and integration solutions, including Telegram bots</secondary>. I am confident working with the full development cycle, <secondary>from frontend to CI/CD setup</secondary>.
AboutMe.description2: I am committed to <secondary>continuous learning</secondary>, value <secondary>team collaboration</secondary>, and am driven to find solutions that deliver <highlight>value to both the business and the team</highlight>.

TechnicalSkills.leftSubtitle: Tools in the hands of a master become an extension of his will.

Experience.leftSubtitle: Every line of code bears the mark of battle. Every project — a new victory.

contract.description: Developed and implemented a headless CMS based on Payload to manage the content of the residential complex's website. Configured data models, access levels, and API, and integrated the system with a Next.js application. Implemented a user-friendly interface for creating and managing pages and news.
contract.resultDescription: The client received a flexible and reliable tool for independently managing the website and publishing content without technical support, which increased the speed and quality of information updates.

cpabox.about: SaaS platform for traffic arbitrage automation
cpabox.description: I was responsible for the development and support of full-stack modules for a SaaS platform that links campaigns from TDS Keitaro with Facebook ad accounts and anti-detect profiles. I created a Telegram checker bot to monitor domains with renewal notifications. I configured API integration with Keitaro and webhooks for data synchronization with ad networks. I also developed a Telegram Web App that used the Keitaro API to fetch a list of domains, allowing users to select them for tracking and add new ones manually.
cpabox.resultDescription: Automated the management of ad funnels, reducing human error and factor, which allowed users to effectively control campaigns and save time.

remotza.description: I participated in the design and development of custom web services. I implemented REST APIs and business logic, configured Redis caching to improve performance and stability with PostgreSQL, and maintained and refined interfaces using Vue.js.
remotza.resultDescription: Clients received ready-made solutions that simplified user data management and made their services more stable and convenient for end-users.

aopsrm.about: An NGO assisting ostomy patients in Moldova
aopsrm.description: I developed a multi-page website for the organization and built a custom CMS for content management, allowing for publishing articles, uploading photos, and adding comments. I configured forms and implemented the core functionality for administration and full project operation. I also set up a CI/CD pipeline via GitLab and deployed the project on a server with a linked domain.
aopsrm.resultDescription: The organization received a complete, turn-key website with a CMS — from design and logic to deployment. This empowered them to independently publish materials and communicate with their audience without needing external specialists.

Education.leftSubtitle: The path isn’t defined by diplomas. Anything that makes you stronger is part of the journey.
Education.educ: Russian University of Cooperation | Accounting and Finance | 2003–2007
Education.pathTitle: from finance to Full-stack Software Engineer:

path.second: 2012-Present: From Hobby Projects to Professional Systems
path.third: For professional growth, I regularly analyze technical articles and conference talks, applying new knowledge to improve code quality and find more effective solutions in my work.

Additional.leftSubtitle: Every project — like a battle. I enter it to win, not just to participate.
Additional.intro: This site is more than a resume; it's a full-stack open-source project showcasing my approach to software development.

projectFeatures.item1: <highlight>Interactive resume</highlight> with a custom visit analytics system.
projectFeatures.item5: Performance optimization (Lighthouse): <highlight>95+ across all Core Web Vitals</highlight>.

Footer.finalWords: I walk my own path. If it crosses yours — reach out.
